errInconsistentTimelock: Minimum gradual weight change duration must be >= add token timelock
errMaxPoolTokens: Pool should contain no more than 8 tokens
errMinPoolTokens: Pool should contain at least 2 tokens
errMinTokenBalance: Token balance in wei form needs to be at least 1,000,000. For example, WBTC has 8 decimals, so the minimum is 0.01 WBTC.
ethBuffer: Keep some ether to pay for gas.
highRiskPool: This is a higher-risk pool that contains one or more unlisted tokens. A liquidity pool is only as good as its weakest token! If a token were blacklisted, infinitely minted, frozen, or exploited in any other way, the value of this pool could go to 0. Balancer Labs is never liable for losses incurred through using our UI or the Balancer protocol. Be careful, and do your own research!
liquidityFail: Adding liquidity might fail with max balance if a trade occurs before the transaction is mined. Use high gas price or

ongoingUpdate:
There is a gradual weights update underway
from {startTime} ({startBlock})
until {endTime} ({endBlock})
pokeWeightsEarly:
The pool has an ongoing gradual weight update
(see About), but has not yet started.
pokeWeightsGeneral: The pool does not currently have an ongoing gradual weight update. If it did, 'Poke' would set the weights to values along the update curve, corresponding to the current block.
pokeWeightsOngoing: The pool has an ongoing gradual weight update (see About). 'Poke' will set the weights to values along the update curve, corresponding to the current block. This operation may change token prices, and might be gas-intensive.
removeTokenWarning:
• Removing a token will redeem BPTs for the balance

selectTokens: Select up to 8 tokens you’d like to have in the pool.

successPokeWeights: You've successfully poked the smart pool
